import React from "react" import Navbar from "./components/Navbar/Navbar" import Intro from "./components/Intro/Intro" import Services from "./components/Services/Services" import "./App.css" import Experience from "./components/Experience/Experience" import Works from "./components/Works/Works" import Portfolio from "./components/Portfolio/Portfolio" import Testimonial from "./components/Testimonials/Testimonial" import Contact from "./components/Contact/Contact" import Footer from "./components/Footer/Footer" import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { themeContext } from "./Context" function App() { const theme = useContext(themeContext) const darkMode = theme.state.darkMode const [showSidebar, setShowSidebar] = useState(false) const renderSideBar = () => { setShowSidebar(true) } const handleClose = () => { setShowSidebar(false) } return (
{showSidebar && (
  • Contact
  • Experience
  • Profile
)}
) } export default App
